publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3740 Patricia Ferguson: North Glasgow Housing Association Completes 900th New Build Home—That the Parliament welcomes the completion of the 65-house development at Mireton Street in Possilpark; recognises the important contribution that this development makes to the regeneration of Possilpark; notes that this development brings the total number of houses built by North Glasgow Housing Association to 900, and congratulates the management committee, staff and tenants on reaching this milestone.

S3M-3740 North Glasgow Housing Association Completes 900th New Build Home (lodged on 18 March 2009) Jamie Hepburn*, Bill Butler*, Helen Eadie*, Des McNulty*, Hugh Henry*, Mr Frank McAveety*, Johann Lamont*, Sandra White*

S3M-3740 Patricia Ferguson: North Glasgow Housing Association Completes 900th New-build Home—That the Parliament welcomes the completion of the 65-house development at Mireton Street in Possilpark; recognises the important contribution that this development makes to the regeneration of Possilpark; notes that this development brings the total number of houses built by North Glasgow Housing Association to 900, and congratulates the management committee, staff and tenants on reaching this milestone. Supported by: Jamie Hepburn, Bill Butler, Helen Eadie, Des McNulty, Hugh Henry, Mr Frank McAveety, Johann Lamont, Sandra White, James Kelly*, Pauline McNeill*, Mary Mulligan*
S3M-3740 North Glasgow Housing Association Completes 900th New-build Home (lodged on 18 March 2009) Karen Whitefield*, David Whitton*
S3M-3740 North Glasgow Housing Association Completes 900th New-build Home (lodged on 18 March 2009) Trish Godman*
S3M-3740 North Glasgow Housing Association Completes 900th New-build Home (lodged on 18 March 2009) Sarah Boyack*
S3M-3740 North Glasgow Housing Association Completes 900th New-build Home (lodged on 18 March 2009) David Stewart*
